Articles.Content:
Hello!

I have accepted contract to build new orbital station on orbit of Minmus.

KSP version 1.8.1, Linux 64 bit, Steam

I've launched living module with power, cabin, antenna, docking ports. And after this I launched 2 fuel tanks and docked them to the station. Also i have launched service ship with engineer, because i forgot to place vernor engines on fuel tanks. A have added them with help of KAS. After docking I have launched number of ships with fuel to deliver 6000 liquid fuel to fuel tanks.

All this actions were done after contract was accepted.

Now I have "Build a new station" unchecked. All other requirements are checked.

 


KSP.log: http://vltc.net.eu.org/KSP.log

[modifier]-f12, contracts, active.

Find your contract. Click "complete". You'll get paid and credited and everything.

There's no easy way to determine which of the hundreds of things that the game could be wrong about, is what the game is wrong about. I don't even think there's a hard way to do it.
What @Superfluous J  said.  Contracts sometimes glitch on one requirement or another and don't want to complete no matter what you do other than the using the debug menu to force complete them.
